channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Should you vote your feelings? A traveling play helps audiences think that through
item.description: An acclaimed Edinburgh Fringe show encourages the audience to think about why they're voting the way they do.
item.content:encoded:
An acclaimed Edinburgh Fringe show encourages the audience to think about why they're voting the way they do.

(Image credit: Michiel Devijver)
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: Getting the COVID vaccine during pregnancy protects newborns from hospitalization
item.description: Babies under six months can't be vaccinated directly against COVID. A new study found that most infants hospitalized for COVID had mothers who didn’t get the vaccine while they were pregnant.
item.content:encoded:
Babies under six months can't be vaccinated directly against COVID. A new study found that most infants hospitalized for COVID had mothers who didn’t get the vaccine while they were pregnant.

(Image credit: Gary Coronado/Los Angeles Times via Getty Imag)
item.dc:creator: Jackie Fortier

item.title: Why the U.S. government is hailing Israel's killing of Hezbollah's leader as 'justice'
item.description: Hezbollah’s leader Hassan Nasrallah was killed by Israeli airstrike this weekend. The Biden administration said it gives the victims of the Iran-backed Lebanese militant group "a measure of justice."
item.content:encoded:
Hezbollah’s leader Hassan Nasrallah was killed by Israeli airstrike this weekend. The Biden administration said it gives the victims of the Iran-backed Lebanese militant group "a measure of justice."

(Image credit: Fareed Khan)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: If you want to stress less, join NPR's quest to reclaim your calm
item.description: Life can be stressful, and how you manage it is key. We have science-backed tips to help you cope. Get five weekly newsletters and a master class in stress management: Join us.
item.content:encoded: Life can be stressful, and how you manage it is key. We have science-backed tips to help you cope. Get five weekly newsletters and a master class in stress management: Join us.
item.dc:creator: Allison Aubrey

item.title: Hezbollah leader's killing sparks joy and rage across the Middle East
item.description: President Biden called the killing of Hassan Nasrallah "a measure of justice for his many victims," while Iran's supreme leader condemned what he called an Israeli massacre in Lebanon.
item.content:encoded:
President Biden called the killing of Hassan Nasrallah "a measure of justice for his many victims," while Iran's supreme leader condemned what he called an Israeli massacre in Lebanon.

(Image credit: Mahmoud Zayyat)
item.dc:creator: Daniel Estrin

item.title: Terry Crews shares the advice his mom gave him that he carries to this day
item.description: Terry Crews went to college on an art scholarship, played football in the NFL and now stars in movies and hosts America's Got Talent. The key, he says, is to be really good at failure.
item.content:encoded:
Season 19 red carpet in March.'/>

Terry Crews went to college on an art scholarship, played football in the NFL and now stars in movies and hosts America's Got Talent. The key, he says, is to be really good at failure.

(Image credit: Kevin Winter)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Martin

item.title: Death toll in Nepal flooding reaches at least 100, dozens still missing
item.description: Dozens were still reported missing as landslides continued across the mountainous country.
item.content:encoded:
Dozens were still reported missing as landslides continued across the mountainous country.

(Image credit: Gopen Rai)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Longtime Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah killed by Israel
item.dc:creator: Hadeel Al-Shalchi

item.title: SpaceX launches ISS-bound crew that hopes to bring home 2 stuck astronauts
item.description: Two astronauts were launched on a five-month mission that also hopes to rescue two NASA astronauts left behind on the ISS. The four are expected to return to Earth in February.
item.content:encoded:
Two astronauts were launched on a five-month mission that also hopes to rescue two NASA astronauts left behind on the ISS. The four are expected to return to Earth in February.

(Image credit: John Raoux)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: Analysis: Hassan Nasrallah’s killing transforms an already deadly regional conflict
item.description: With Hassan Nasrallah dead in Israeli airstrikes, the Iran-backed militant group is facing enormous challenges as the region is yet again thrown into uncertainty.
item.content:encoded:
With Hassan Nasrallah dead in Israeli airstrikes, the Iran-backed militant group is facing enormous challenges as the region is yet again thrown into uncertainty.

(Image credit: Hussein Malla)
item.dc:creator: Daniel Estrin
